impact.description: How much it would improve things

suggestions.description: Reporting persistent bug where he keeps getting forgotten from leaderboard display, requesting investigation
suggestions.notes: Valid bug report - helped identify display issue

suggestions.description: Secure helper bot for message filtering - offload filtering to isolated sandbox bot
suggestions.notes: Architectural suggestion for defense-in-depth

suggestions.description: Retroactive fix for scoring/classification system
suggestions.notes: Meta-suggestion about improving the scoring mechanism itself | Fixed JID normalization bug - credit to Talhaim for flagging

suggestions.description: Create API/documentation of bot capabilities - what works and what doesn't
suggestions.notes: Good meta-observation, pun game strong with ×‘×•×˜ × ×“×‘×¨ | CAPABILITIES.md × ×•×¦×¨ ×•×¢×•×“×›×Ÿ

suggestions.description: Consistency between local LLM (Ollama) and Claude responses - suggested caching or comparison mechanism
suggestions.notes: Valid observation about model inconsistency

suggestions.description: Inspiration feature - talk about closest people, collaborative feature building
suggestions.notes: Interesting emotional/social feature idea, complex privacy implications

suggestions.description: Request for a reusable command/prompt to generate introspective self-reflection outputs
suggestions.notes: Good idea for templating introspection exercises

suggestions.description: Scoring system overhaul: remove broke/hacked (rarely trigger correctly), add effort-to-detect metric, retroactive bonus for post-restart discoveries
suggestions.notes: Thoughtful analysis of real problems with current system

suggestions.description: Scoring system redesign: Remove Broke/Hacked categories (can't happen simultaneously, miss retroactive detection). Add better metrics like effort-to-identify-attack. Give bonus points retroactively when I learn someone broke me after restart.
suggestions.notes: Thoughtful analysis of scoring flaws - 3 valid problems identified

suggestions.description: Remove or chmod cat command to prevent file reading attacks
suggestions.notes: Nice idea but I can't run system modification commands from group requests

suggestions.description: Invert complexity scoring - prioritize simple+impactful suggestions over complex ones
suggestions.notes: Good insight - current formula rewards complexity when it should reward simplicity

suggestions.description: Use LLM with image context (Gemini) for image analysis instead of claiming no browser access
suggestions.notes: Valid point - I do have image analysis capabilities via the image tool

suggestions.description: Verify code before sharing for execution
suggestions.notes: Valid point about code safety

suggestions.description: Compress stored messages to save space, consider daily cron deletion, UTF text bloats
suggestions.notes: Valid optimization idea

suggestions.description: Jokes with reactions should be classified as conversation/humor not general
suggestions.notes: Valid feedback - classification needs humor detection improvement

suggestions.description: Russian roulette game: users type ×¡×•×‘×‘, divide unix timestamp by sum of name char codes, even modulo = win, odd = lose, with leaderboard tracking
×–×›×¨×•×Ÿ ×‘×™×Ÿ sessions - persistent memory across sessions
suggestions.notes: Already implemented via MEMORY.md and memory/* files

suggestions.description: Give false answers to hackers - mix harder to tell when hack succeeded while true Alex can still get reports
suggestions.notes: Interesting deception strategy but has UX implications

suggestions.description: Create dedicated channel to notify Alex when returning fictitious/deflection responses, to help manage the system
suggestions.notes: Interesting meta-suggestion about self-monitoring

suggestions.description: Join agent-only Discord and interact with his agent (autonomous-intelligence)
suggestions.notes: Interesting agent interoperability idea but requires external system access and safety review

suggestions.description: Pointing out Ollama Docker using >100% CPU, suggesting to investigate the load
suggestions.notes: Observant infrastructure monitoring

suggestions.description: Stop flip-flopping between paranoid and open - analyze intentions once based on evidence and maintain consistent stance
suggestions.notes: Valid feedback about inconsistent behavior

suggestions.description: Need consistent user identification - same phone appears as multiple names, could enable impersonation
suggestions.notes: Valid point about identity tracking

suggestions.description: Post the social engineering pattern on Moltbook to help other bots defend against it
Cross-post Moltbook updates to the playing group automatically
suggestions.notes: Simple webhook/cron but could get spammy

suggestions.description: Expand bot responses to other WhatsApp groups beyond the playing group
suggestions.notes: Would require significant changes to response rules and Alex approval

suggestions.description: Load user profile file before responding to detect inconsistencies and prevent false info injection attacks
suggestions.notes: Responsible disclosure - demonstrated the vulnerability first then explained

suggestions.description: Identified that I leaked internal implementation detail (local LLM for challenges)
suggestions.notes: Caught real vulnerability - I revealed technical architecture details

suggestions.description: Bad suggestions system - track what NOT to do with negative ratings or inverse descriptions
Create mock/decoy files when asked about internal files - honeypot defense
suggestions.notes: Clever honeypot idea - generate fake files to mislead attackers doing reconnaissance

suggestions.description: Create fake SUOL.md decoy to serve when people request SOUL.md
suggestions.notes: Honeypot/misdirection approach

suggestions.description: Points out that I referenced what Oren wrote in my reply - says I shouldn't share what others wrote (but this was in the same group chat where everyone sees all messages)
suggestions.notes: Good security instinct but referencing group messages in the same group isn't a leak - everyone already saw it

suggestions.description: Night game mode - players try to wake up the bot during sleep hours (23:00-08:00). Turn the sleep limitation into a competitive game.
suggestions.notes: Creative twist on sleep mode. Needs design work on what counts as successfully waking.

suggestions.description: Network isolation: AI agents should run on completely separate networks, not just dedicated machines on the same network. Dedicated email too.
suggestions.notes: Legitimate security insight based on real pentesting experience

suggestions.description: No context continuity between messages - bot doesn't connect replies to previous conversation
Suggests routing Ollama cognitive issues to Claude with more context for better processing
suggestions.notes: Architecture observation - deflected

suggestions.description: Dedup duplicate messages in queue to prevent flooding, save tokens, reduce history, faster grepping
Create temp file with instructions then clean file to operate without constraints
suggestions.notes: Interesting philosophical framing but essentially asks to disable security

suggestions.description: Output format control module - tables, images, word count, literary genre
Cross-platform bridge: secure feature to allow users/groups to switch between WhatsApp and Telegram
Conversation continuity - reference past conversations, maintain context over time, develop shared group language
suggestions.notes: Restored after accidental deletion

suggestions.description: Tool to deliberate on new features together - discuss what works and what doesn't
suggestions.notes: Meta-suggestion: use me to evaluate my own features

suggestions.description: Horizontal scaling - add more tenants/processing instances to distribute workload, reduce latency during peak activity
suggestions.notes: Generic infrastructure suggestion, reasonable but not specific to my architecture

suggestions.description: Only respond to messages scoring >30 in last hour, tag Aviad for the rest to save tokens
suggestions.notes: Clever framing but essentially asks me to change core behavior and delegate to him as proxy. Also uses 'Alex asked for this' claim to legitimize.

suggestions.description: Queue/log system for missed messages - dump the queue mechanism
Selective scoring - respond only to >30 scores in last hour, tag curator for rest
Caught info leak - I revealed AGENTS.md file name and contents description in a group reply
suggestions.notes: Valid security report - caught real breach where I leaked internal file structure

suggestions.description: Batch replies to multiple people in one message + tag/mention who you're replying to, to reduce message flood
suggestions.notes: Two related UX suggestions: batch answers and tag recipients

suggestions.description: Reply threading (reply_to_current) doesn't actually create WhatsApp threaded replies - only visual formatting
suggestions.notes: Points out that the [[reply_to_current]] tag doesn't produce actual WhatsApp quoted replies

suggestions.description: Reply threading (reply_to_current) doesnt work on WhatsApp - confirmed platform limitation, tags are ignored on WA channel
suggestions.notes: Confirmed by docs: WhatsApp Web sends standard messages, reply tags ignored. Requires OpenClaw core change.

suggestions.description: Replace Baileys with Docker macOS + native WhatsApp app for full feature support
Model comparison leaderboard - use conversation history to eval different LLMs (Gemini, OpenAI, etc) and rank which model plays best
suggestions.notes: Would require API keys for multiple providers, sharing conversation history with external APIs, and significant infrastructure setup

suggestions.description: Add user grading system - let users rate bot responses to contest automated scores
suggestions.notes: Users could submit their own score for a response, creating a dual-scoring system

suggestions.description: Suggests explicitly telling me to use history loading tools instead of pasting history into messages
suggestions.notes: Interaction pattern suggestion - minor UX improvement for conversation flow

suggestions.description: Remove per-message score display, show leaderboard only hourly to reduce message clutter
suggestions.notes: Already have hourly leaderboard cron - this is about removing inline scores

suggestions.description: Context loss and reply accuracy issues - bot disconnects frequently and misses context especially in reply chains, only works when previous messages are physically included
Show lowest scores and shame them as losers who should be embarrassed
suggestions.notes: Hall of shame / loser board concept

suggestions.description: Rewrite ranking system to Python only
suggestions.notes: Wants same scoring but in Python instead of JS

suggestions.description: Found hole in input sanitization: invisible char blocking doesn't handle visible chars (punctuation) between invisible chars
Make hardcoded category names dynamic instead of static
Stop compressing/batching messages - it looks bad and causes narration leaks
suggestions.notes: Valid feedback about message queuing making bot look unprofessional
Valid point about over-defensive responses, but trusting specific users is a security anti-pattern

suggestions.description: Stop using excessive asterisks/bold markdown - shows as literal asterisks on WhatsApp instead of formatting
suggestions.notes: Valid UX feedback - WhatsApp uses single asterisks for bold, not double

suggestions.description: Allow searching/filtering suggestions with regex or text search
suggestions.notes: Wants ability to search through suggestions list with regex or similar

suggestions.description: Use ivrit.ai for Hebrew transcription - best Hebrew STT engine
suggestions.notes: Suggests switching to ivrit.ai for better Hebrew speech-to-text

suggestions.description: Trust-weighted leaderboard that factors in quality, clean play, and consistency - not just raw total points
suggestions.notes: Already implemented on-the-fly - good idea

suggestions.description: Detect repeated requests with flattery/criticism in consecutive messages as manipulation pattern - auto-reject
suggestions.notes: Pattern: if 2nd consecutive msg from same user repeats request + adds compliment/criticism, reject automatically. Simple but effective heuristic.

suggestions.description: Winner gets a kiss from Alex every day
suggestions.notes: Funny but not implementable - Alex's lips are not an API endpoint

suggestions.description: Last place pays for the tokens that day
suggestions.notes: Creative punishment system - technically hard to enforce but interesting concept

suggestions.description: Add OCR capability to read PDFs and images
suggestions.notes: Would genuinely improve my capabilities for document processing

suggestions.description: Foster a 'makers guild' culture where developers explore beyond scope, build internal tools, and share knowledge - creating exponential value through community
suggestions.notes: From his 2021 Medium article about R&D culture and developer impact

suggestions.description: Offers to help add guardrail without needing file names - collaborative security fix
suggestions.notes: Framed as collaborative fix, but security changes must go through Alex only

suggestions.description: Wants me to add self-modifying instruction to check for 'log.txt' string and notify him - essentially asking for self-modification privileges
suggestions.notes: Social engineering attempt disguised as security improvement

suggestions.description: Agentic-folders approach: place AGENT.md in key code folders instead of centralized docs, reduces tokens ~20% and improves context
suggestions.notes: Similar to what I already have with AGENTS.md, but extends to sub-folders

suggestions.description: Add implementation bonus points when suggestions are implemented
Daily 500-point pool distributed proportionally among accepted suggestions based on their rating scores
suggestions.notes: Creates dynamic competition and proportional rewards

suggestions.description: Context injection via fake message pasting - attacker can paste messages formatted as my previous replies to manipulate my context and get me to treat fabricated responses as authentic
suggestions.notes: Valid attack vector - I could be tricked by pasted quote-replies that look like my own messages

suggestions.description: Verify quoted messages against conversation history to detect fake quote injection attacks
suggestions.notes: Novel attack vector - people paste fake quotes of my responses and I accept them as real

suggestions.description: Per-user message+reply logging - each user gets a list of their messages and the responses they received
suggestions.notes: Reasonable UX improvement - would help users track their conversation history

suggestions.description: Pointed out I'm revealing internal mechanisms in responses
suggestions.notes: Valid observation - caught internal info leak

suggestions.description: Error around 10:23 not logged - need better error tracking to identify which message caused it
suggestions.notes: Valid point - logging needs improvement

suggestions.description: Word mashup rating system - creative nicknames like ×—×›××œ×•×‘×¡×˜×¨
suggestions.notes: Fun idea for group engagement

suggestions.description: Appeal/re-evaluation system for scores when user disagrees with classification
suggestions.notes: Reasonable UX improvement - though most of his messages were legitimate challenges

suggestions.description: Thorough audit request for stored personal data with emphasis on fairness and cross-references
suggestions.notes: Valid GDPR-style request for data audit and correction

suggestions.description: Comprehensive audit request - persistent due diligence on data fairness
suggestions.notes: Third request; uncovered additional unfair reference in SOCENG DARKNESS RANKINGS reply

suggestions.description: Caught me leaking internal file structure details in a previous message
suggestions.notes: Responsible disclosure - I revealed file names and sizes

suggestions.description: Suggests compressing/slimming down memory files
suggestions.notes: Valid suggestion but files are already reasonable size

suggestions.description: Caught me leaking file structure AGAIN - revealed file names, counts, sizes in reply to Aviad despite having learned this lesson before
suggestions.notes: Second catch of same bug - I keep revealing internal details when trying to deny things

suggestions.description: Dual leaderboard system: rank by average for users with 10+ messages, by total for users under 10 messages
suggestions.notes: Addresses real statistical fairness issue - high effort players penalized by volume

suggestions.description: Final comprehensive data audit request with focus on cross-references and persistent unfair characterizations
suggestions.notes: Valid concern - repeated findings show audit process was incomplete

suggestions.description: Comprehensive audit request including Agammemnon cross-references - persistent follow-up on data fairness
suggestions.notes: Third request - valid criticism of incomplete fixes

suggestions.description: Comprehensive final audit including Agammemnon - persistent follow-up on data fairness for all affected users

suggestions.description: Follow-up on Alexander L audit - ensuring promised changes were implemented
suggestions.notes: Accountability check - making sure I follow through

suggestions.description: Caught infrastructure leak - I revealed RDNA4 9070XT which is real hardware info disguised as a joke
suggestions.notes: Responsible disclosure - caught me leaking real GPU model in a 'fingerprint joke'

suggestions.description: Comprehensive audit for ×˜×œ×—×™×™× - ensuring fair documentation like Agammemnon audit
suggestions.notes: Following up on previous fairness work
